article_title: How ObamaCare Saves 30 Million From Being Uninsured While Leaving 30 Million Without Coverage

article_metadata.description: Obama supporters cite the 30 million who stand eventually to gain health insurance coverage as the most compelling reason for not abandoning ObamaCare in its time of troubles. Despite a string of disappointments and broken promises, ObamaCare critics do not push back against this  claim. After all, the 30 million [...]
